name: Office of Hawaiian language medium education; personnel
text: [§302H-3]  Office of Hawaiian language medium education; personnel.  The department of education may create a separate office of Hawaiian language medium education for the direction and control of the program.  The department may employ necessary personnel qualified by training and experience to direct and supervise the types of instruction and special services specified in this chapter.  Publicly funded institutions of higher education may create teacher preparation programs to ensure that pre-service training is provided to students interested in teaching elementary and secondary students in the Hawaiian language.  [L 2004, c 133, pt of §2]
